snippet: President Obama will have to explain how the United States can avoid entanglement in another military morass if it moves more aggressively into Syria.
abstract: Editorial poses questions for Pres Obama concerning proposed airstrikes in Syria against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, including the need for congressional authorization; holds Obama must also explain how such strikes fit into a broader strategy, how they can be conducted without benefiting Syrian dictator Bashar al-Assad, and how the United States can avoid entanglement in yet another military morass.
lead_paragraph: President Obama will have to explain how the United States can avoid entanglement in another military morass if it moves more aggressively into Syria.
